cause.description:
We at P.A. are very serious about partying therefore intend to save the young by educating them in party modalities of the past, present and future.
We will show the safe practice of PARTYING.
Newcomers will enjoy; one on one and group tutelage for safe practice of our system.
This fund will help our members enjoy safe partying!
be safe and God bless
1. Unsafe party behavior finished
2. Uncool Intoxication terminated
3. Party behavior brought to another level
4. Spread the wealth of knowledge
cause.name: Puerto Rico PARTYers Anonymous (seriously)
